definitions.definition: The condition of being exposed , uncovered , or unprotected .
examples: Limit your exposure to harsh chemicals.   Get as much exposure to a new language as you can.

definitions.definition: Lack of protection from weather or the elements .
The act of exposing something, such as a scandal .
The act or condition of being at risk of financial losses.
That part which is facing or exposed to something, e.g. the sun , weather , sky , or a view .
examples: They rented a cabin with a beautiful southern exposure .

definitions.definition: An instance of taking a photograph .
The piece of film exposed to light.
Details of the time and f-number used.
The amount of sun , wind etc. experienced by a particular site.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The condition of being exposed , uncovered , or unprotected .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) Lack of protection from weather or the elements .
The act of exposing something, such as a scandal .
The act or condition of being at risk of financial losses.
( countable , uncountable ) That part which is facing or exposed to something, e.g. the sun , weather , sky , or a view .
( photography ) An instance of taking a photograph .
( photography ) The piece of film exposed to light.
( photography ) Details of the time and f-number used.
( horticulture ) The amount of sun , wind etc. experienced by a particular site.
